response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. For this incredible opportunity, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this exceptional deal. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to potentially serving you with our premium product.", "product_price": 15000}
